description: Template with self feedback. The input is the first round output
prompt_input:
[Start of the question]
{instruction}

[End of the question]

Please improve your first round answer, and try to improve the helpfulness, relevance, correctness and level of detail of your response. Avoid any factual errors and hallucinations.

[Start of the first round answer]
{input}

[End of the first round answer]

### Response:
